forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two possible this evening with partly cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 38F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 3C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 37F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 52F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 10C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. High 52F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High near 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low around 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 6C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 43F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.
